Quiz.Q-1: What is an array in JavaScript?
Quiz.OP-A: A special variable that can hold more than one value at a time
Quiz.Answer: A special variable that can hold more than one value at a time

Quiz.Q-2: How do you create an array in JavaScript?

Quiz.Q-3: How do you access the first element of an array?

Quiz.Q-4: What is the correct syntax to find the length of an array?

Quiz.Q-5: Which method adds a new element to the end of an array?

Quiz.Q-6: Which method removes the last element from an array?

Quiz.Q-7: Which method adds a new element to the beginning of an array?

Quiz.Q-8: Which method removes the first element from an array?

Quiz.Q-9: How do you join all elements of an array into a string?

Quiz.Q-10: Which method returns a new array with all elements that pass a test implemented by the provided function?

Quiz.Q-11: How do you add new elements to the beginning of an array without removing any existing elements?

Quiz.Q-12: Which method can be used to merge two or more arrays?

Quiz.Q-13: Which method creates a new array with the results of calling a provided function on every element in the array?

Quiz.Q-14: How do you find the index of a specific element in an array?

Quiz.Q-15: Which method removes elements from an array and, if necessary, inserts new elements in their place?

Quiz.Q-16: How do you create a new array that is a shallow copy of a portion of an existing array?

Quiz.Q-17: Which method executes a provided function once for each array element?

Quiz.Q-18: Which method tests whether all elements in the array pass the provided function?

Quiz.Q-19: Which method tests whether at least one element in the array passes the provided function?

Quiz.Q-20: Which method sorts the elements of an array in place and returns the sorted array?

Quiz.Q-21: Which method applies a function against an accumulator and each element in the array to reduce it to a single value?

Quiz.Q-22: How do you check if an array includes a certain element?

Quiz.Q-23: Which method creates a new array instance from an array-like or iterable object?

Quiz.Q-24: Which method returns the first element in the array that satisfies the provided testing function?

Quiz.Q-25: Which method returns the index of the first element in the array that satisfies the provided testing function?
